extendedInfo.description: Your webcam is ready for broadcast.Gaaiho Cam allows your smartphone to view, control, and receive alerts from standard PC webcams. On vacation? Install multiple webcams at home and view them live from across the world. Set the motion detector to contact you and start recording when triggerred. You can also use Gaaiho Cam as a pet, nanny, or workplace monitor.With GCam Swarm, publishing your camera to others is a breeze. Live event broadcasting is simple and speedy with no expensive equipment or setups required. Create a neighborhood watch surveillance network which authorized users can monitor anytime from their PC or smartphone.Features:-Speedy DIY Setup-Watch multiple cameras-Customize access rules for your Camvie-Motion detection with instant push e-mail and mobile app alert-PTZ control, audio, and record video-TLS/SSL encryption-Supports all PC webcams (with GCam Server)Note: To use Gaaiho Cam you must also install Gaaiho Cam Server to your webcam's PC (Windows only):http://www.gaaiho.com/Products/Cam_download.aspx

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: This was definitely the first app that I got to work and loved. Thanks so much. I would definitely recommend it to other people.
reviews.author: Jennifer Monge

reviews.title: Excellant
reviews.comment: First webcam app i\'ve got to work. Thank you.
reviews.author: Adrian York

reviews.title: Slick camera app
reviews.comment: Love the design, its intuitive and easy to use. Great control features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It is FREE and work perfectly!
reviews.comment: tried my Logitech PTZ Webcam, and really like the joystick control! good job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Hard to get it going at times
reviews.comment: It was hard to get it going remotely at the beginning had to save as favorite and ut will work fine. Wont connect sometimes, works much better where I here is wifi access, 4g connections are erratic. Nexus 4
reviews.author: Raul Huerta
